oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Photomontage of group pictures of people associated with Belmont Heights Baptist Church. Tennessean, 1931 February 1.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Sloan, George W.; Fetzer, N. B.; Langham, Mrs. F. G.; Richardson, Mrs. N. F.; Hestle, Mrs. G. B.
Nashville Tennessean
Group portraits; Churches; Children
Nashville (Tenn.)--History--Sources; Nashville (Tenn.)--Social life and customs; Nashville and Davidson County (Tenn.)--History--Sources
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Photomontage of group pictures of people associated with Belmont Heights Baptist Church. Pictured are the men's bible class, the beginners' department, homemakers' class, fellowship class, young people's department, the junior department, and the primary department. 16 x 21.5 in. Forms part of the Nashville Newspaper Rotogravure Digital Images Collection.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Commerical Photograph Co.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:publisher: Metropolitan Nashville/Davidson County Archives, Nashville Public Library
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:relation: Nashville Newspaper Rotogravure Digital Images Collection.
